member.name: T:BattleField2.WpfGUI.CellDecorator.CellDecorator
member.summary: This is an abstract decorator implementation for the Cell class. Implementing Decorator design pattern

member.name: T:BattleField2.WpfGUI.CellDecorator.ObservableCellDecorator
member.summary: This is a concrete decorator implementation for the Cell class. Needed to pass additional info to the XAML View Implementing Decorator design pattern

member.name: T:BattleField2.WpfGUI.CellTemplateSelector
member.summary: This is template selector class, determing which specific Cell template is passed to the XAML Canvas of the View.

member.name: T:BattleField2.WpfGUI.Converter.GridMarginConverter
member.summary: This is an converter, passing values for defining the margin of the Grid element in which all the Cells are placed in the XAML View.

member.name: T:BattleField2.WpfGUI.Converter.PositionConverter
member.summary: This is an converter, passing values for positioning Cells in the XAML Canvas of the View.

member.name: T:BattleField2.WpfGUI.RelayCommand
member.summary: This is an ICommand implementation for all the commands in the ViewModel. This class implements Command design pattern.

member.name: T:BattleField2.WpfGUI.ViewModels.BattlefieldViewModel
member.summary: Interaction logic for BattlefieldView.xaml This is the game ViewModel class. Implements MVVM Architectural pattern

member.name: T:BattleField2.WpfGUI.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:BattleField2.WpfGUI.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:BattleField2.WpfGUI.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.
